title: Metallica - Live on Pinkpop 2008
description:
A shortened version of the performance of Metallica at Pinkpop 2008 in the Netherlands. It was broadcasted on TV on the \&#039;Nederland 3\&#039; channel.

I recorded it on analog cable signal because i just bought a hdd recorder but didn\&#039;t had a scart wired properly for digital tv recording.

Ripped from a 3,55Gb dubbed VOB file.

The playlist is:

Ride The Lightning
The Memory Remains
Fade To Black
Nothing Else Matters
One
Enter Sandman

(if i\&#039;m not mistaken!)
